mapper.sql: PROCESS_ID, IMEI, UA, MODEL_NAME, CHANNEL_ID, DEVICE_CODE, GROUP_ID, BATCH_CODE, PROCESS_TIME, CREATE_TIME
mapper.select: select count(process_id) from ${tableName} where create_time >= trunc(SYSDATE-1) and create_time< trunc(SYSDATE)
select count(process_id) from ${tableName} where create_time >= #{startDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and create_time< #{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
